title: An unexpected error has occurred LAG CANT SEARCH RANKED
body: this randomly pops up and am having tons of lag sometimes i cant search ranked or connect to chat im pretty sure its the server becasue my net is fine and my friend was having it.

replies.body:
Yes something is wrong with the server

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
ive just signed in properly cant look at my account rank or stats the lag is absolutely insane.
